name: Cloud Computing
description:
A 5 part online training course on cloud computing, introducing the development and management of applications deployed in a cloud environment, and exploring the frameworks to support the management of both data and applications. Topics covered will also include architectures and technologies, Apache Hadoop, Hadoop Distributed File System, Hadoop Map Reduce, Hive and cloud infrastructure security. Through various activities particiapnts will explore Microsoft Azure. 

There is no evidence to be submitted for the completion of these modules, once the materials have been reviewed the students self declare completion.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of self assessed knowledge

criteria.narrative: Participants must complete all the online courses and the associated exercises to be awarded the digital badge.
